examples.korean: The prime minister is at the centre of a political row over leaked Cabinet documents. 발음듣기 내각 문서 유출을 둘러싼 정치적 공방의 중심에는 수상이 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The prime minister is at the centre of a political row over leaked Cabinet documents. 발음

examples.korean: Workshops selling artisanal goods line the ground floors of half-a-century-old brick buildings. The butcher's shop sits right next to a glass-walled Thai restaurant cloaked in white linen curtains. 발음듣기 벽돌로 지어진 50년 된 건물들 1층에 수공예품을 파는 공방들이 줄지어 있다. 하얀 리넨 커튼으로 가려진 유리 벽의 태국 음식점 바로 옆에는 정육점이 있다. The Korea Times
examples.english: Workshops selling artisanal goods line the ground floors of half-a-century-old brick buildings. The butcher's shop sits right next to a glass-walled Thai restaurant cloaked in white linen curtains. 발음

examples.korean: That, they say, will be the next front in the political war over the 'culture of life.' 발음듣기 이것은 '생명 존중 문화'를 둘러싼 정치적 공방에서 다음 목표가 될 것입니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That, they say, will be the next front in the political war over the 'culture of life.' 발음

examples.korean: There is a desperate political battle between the ruling and opposition parties. 발음듣기 여야 간에 치열한 정치적 공방이 벌어지고 있다 Neungyule
examples.english: There is a desperate political battle between the ruling and opposition parties. 발음

examples.korean: Our company is fighting a legal battle. 발음듣기 우리 회사는 법정 공방을 하고 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: Our company is fighting a legal battle. 발음
